resources.string: VESmail

VESmail is running

VESmail
Add Email

Connected email accounts:
VESmailErrorLocal
VESmail bad email app settings
The settings in your local email app that are pointing to the VESmail proxy are incorrect or incomplete
VESmailErrorRemote
VESmail bad remote settings
The settings in your VESmail profile are incorrect or incomplete, or there are problems with your email provider servers
Bad settings in the VESmail profile or email server error
%s %s: Click to review the profile

Bad %s username: %s. Click to find the correct VESmail settings

%s %s: Click to check the settings and save the profile
Bad %s hostname for %s, or a problem with the server. Click to review.
Connection problem to %s server for %s. Click to review.
TLS error on %s server for %s. Click to review.
SASL error for %s server for %s. Click to review.
Bad response from %s server for %s. Click to review.
